about_the_game:
• About 15+ levels of the famous Backrooms universe

  • Its own atmosphere and unique presentation of the story

  • Realistic graphics achieved using the Unreal Engine 5

  • Single Player

 "You play the role of Ethan along with your friend William, go after a successful house robbery and decide that this was your last case.

 After that, both main characters get into the Backrooms. Now you and your friend are separated by millions of kilometers, and you will probably never meet again.

 You will have to solve many puzzles and mysteries of liminal rooms to find a way out of these musty rooms.

 The only problem is that you are not alone here..."

  • Multiplayer

 "Many years after Ethan's story, a Backrooms research company finds out what happened to Ethan and his friend, and sends a group of several scientists to search for you.

 Will you be able to go through what Ethan went through and get what you came for?
 
 it depends only on you..."

name: Through The Backrooms

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-9400
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 30 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-11600KF
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 30 MB available space

short_description: You as Ethan, a robber who wants to end his criminal past. Suddenly you fall in the Backrooms and now you have to solve the mystery of the liminal rooms to find a way out. But you are not alone here...
supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Spain*, Russian*
*languages with full audio support
